content:
hl7-fhircast-bot opened Issue #227

## May 2019 Ballot Comment: Missing event catalog information

Submitted by Greg Staudenmaier on behalf of @IoanaSingureanu (ioana.singureanu@bookzurman.com )
Chapter/section:
Url:
Type: A-T
In Person requested: Yes :bust_in_silhouette:

Summary: Missing event catalog information

Comment: The sample code in GitHub has some example but an event catalog is not provided. It's important to have such catalog for an IG of WebSub.

Existing wording: https://fhircast.hl7.org/#event-catalog

_This issue was imported by @hl7-fhircast-bot from the consolidated FHIRcast May 2019 ballot spreadsheet._

wmaethner commented on Issue #227

## Montreal May 2019 Working Group Vote

Anthony Jullian moved the following disposition, seconded by Chris Carr

Disposition: Not related
Disposition Comment: Outside of the proposed spec, but will fix as described (make the link resolve correctly)

:+1: For: 12
:expressionless: Abstain: 0
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:

isaacvetter commented on Issue #227:

Due to the refactoring of the event catalog, we no longer has a single url that could be the target of an Event Catalog link; however, the event catalog is much more visible on the site due to its being on the menu.

I'm removing the broken link to fix this issue. This issue is also a duplicate of #138 and #169, #110, #227.
